comments.body: @danielmellado Does `state_deleted` delete the vlan or remove configurations from the vlan when `config` is given in a task?
it does delete the vlan, you can check what would happen in the deleted sample ;)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +203,207 @@            vlan_name = config['name']
            vlan_root = build_root_xml_node('vlan')
            vlan_root.attrib.update({'delete': 'delete'})
            build_child_xml_node(vlan_root, 'name', vlan_name)
            intf_xml.append(vlan_root)
